title: Cannot see my Club as a Club owner
body:
I'm the owner of a Club but recently I found out that my clubs have cleared and that I'm no longer part of a Club. The other members can see me as the Owner.

The Club name is: Dutch Game Teams
The tag is: DGTNL
My summoner name is DT Sytec

If someone could check this, then I'm very thankful! I've also sent in a ticket (Ticket number: #25107587)

Regards,
DT Sytec

replies.body: I do see that your ticket was successfully received.  A specialist will look into this and work with you individually to get this resolved.  Just make sure not to reply to your ticket until you receive a response, otherwise you may return to the bottom of the queue.  Hang tight until then!
